title: [Helden Hall, Workshop]
description: Your pulse pounds and your skin tingles from the essence-saturated contents of this room.  Images of weapons come to mind, fashioned from many different exotic ores being molded and sharpened to a degree you have only dreamed of.  A large table sits in the center of the room, containing every imaginable type of item.  A chest rests against the far wall and a pedal-driven whetstone takes up a full corner of the room
